EmailTemplate.subject: Year 6 Residential Trip - Revised Schedule
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Parents, We have received several requests for details of the revised schedule for the Y6 residential trip. Please see the information below. Apologies that not all of you received the hard copy sent out last Friday. Also do understand that a full project based programme is planned at school for those unable to attend.
Best regards,
Paul.
Residential Trip: Wales Revised schedule (42,000 Rubles)
Flight Details
Outbound flight: BD 896 26 MAY 2012
Depart DME 7:00am Arrive LHR 8:00am
Inbound flight: BD 895 01 JUN 2012
Depart LHR 22:35pm Arrive DME 05:35am (+ 1 day)
*Please note that this is an overnight flight and we will arrive back in Moscow on Saturday 02nd June.
Revised Schedule
Saturday
· Depart Moscow, fly to Heathrow- Coach to accommodation
· Evening: Splashland
Sunday
· Beach Day- surfing, sea kayaking, beach games
· Visit to local seaside resort or BBQ
Monday
· Cardiff: Capital city of Wales. Possible activities include-
· Techniquest- Science Museum
· St Fagans- Open Air History Museum
· Boat ride around Cardiff Bay
· A walk around the city
·
Tuesday
· Walk around The Gower Peninsula
· Margam Country Park
Wednesday
· Trip to Gloucestershire: Possible activities include-
· Slimbridge Wildlife Centre
· Berkley Castle
· Jenner Museum
· Cinema
Thursday
· Quad biking
· High ropes
· Problem solving games
· Drive to London, stay in London hotel overnight.
Friday
· London: (The British Museum, Hyde Park, The National Gallery, Natural History Museum)
· River Thames scenic boat tour
· Depart Heathrow PM
· Arrive Moscow
